_header: That thou cry to Him with sorrow of heart
Subjects: mercy; sermons, verse in; devotional verse
_description: Verse urging one to beg for mercy — one 8-line stanza in a Latin sermon Jesu, fili David, miserere mei (Mt. 15:22)

CULIi38.Transcription:
þat þu crye to hy wiþ sorwe of herteþat swat
                    water and blodþe bondes of þy synne to vnbyndeþat
                    þu schryfe þe to hym mekelyþat dyed vp on þe
                    rood& be not to hym vnkyndeþat þu make a ser for thy
                    synneand hafe ys mercy euer yn mynde
CULIi38.Editions:
Stemmler,  Theo. 
             “More English Texts from MS. Cambridge University Library
                Ii.III.8.” 
             Anglia
         93 (1975): 1-16: 10.
